mapper.insert: insert into TB_CRM_CUSTOMER (ID, OWNER_USER_ID, CREATOR_USER_ID, NAME, ORIGIN, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, INDUSTRY, ANNUAL_REVENUE, OWNERSHIP, RATING, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_STATUS, IS_LOCKED, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ownerUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annualRevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isLocked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update TB_CRM_CUSTOMER set OWNER_USER_ID = #{ownerUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR_USER_ID = #{creatorUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANNUAL_REVENUE = #{annualRevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNERSHIP = #{ownership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RATING = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_STATUS = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_LOCKED = #{isLocked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_USER_ID = #{deleteUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, OWNER_USER_ID, CREATOR_USER_ID, NAME, ORIGIN, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, INDUSTRY, ANNUAL_REVENUE, OWNERSHIP, RATING, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_STATUS, IS_LOCKED, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME from TB_CRM_CUSTOMER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select ID, OWNER_USER_ID, CREATOR_USER_ID, NAME, ORIGIN, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, INDUSTRY, ANNUAL_REVENUE, OWNERSHIP, RATING, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_STATUS, IS_LOCKED, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME from TB_CRM_CUSTOMER
